name: Triangall
description:
Compete against a friend for a best of 3 match!

Move and spin to hit the triangall into the opposing goal! First to three points wins

Press ESC to restart the game!

Player 1 Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Q to rotate counter clockwise
  • E to rotate clockwise

Player 2 Controls:

  • JILK to move 
  • U to rotate counter clockwise
  • O to rotate clockwise
  • Alternatively, player 2 can use the numpad buttons

Be careful! once you start spinning you can't stop! (though you can change direction)

Made with Godot: godotengine.org/license
